qas.question: What did youtube announce in Feb of 2015?
what was the name of the new app youtube launched?
What platform was launched in Aug of 2015?
What is the name of the youtube feature that removes ads and allows downloading movies?

plausible_answers.text: the launch of a new app

qas.question: What OS is YouTube kids unavailable?
What's the name of the program that gives ads?
What did YouTube launch in August 2015 for children?
What was launched to compete with Twitch.VT?
What premium service was launched in February 2015?

context: In February 2015, YouTube announced <b5_0>the launch of <a0_0>a new app<b5_0/><a0_0/> specifically for use by children visiting the site, called <a1_0><b10_0>YouTube Kids<b10_0/><a1_0/>. It allows parental controls and restrictions on who can upload content, and is available for <a4_0>both <b8_0>Android and iOS<b8_0/><a4_0/> devices. Later on August 26, 2015, <a2_0><b6_0><b11_0><b12_0>YouTube Gaming<b12_0/><b11_0/><b6_0/><a2_0/> was launched, a platform for video gaming enthusiasts intended to compete with Twitch.tv. 2015 also saw the announcement of a premium YouTube service titled <a3_0><b9_0><b13_0>YouTube Red<b13_0/><b9_0/><a3_0/>, which provides users with both <b7_0>ad-free content<b7_0/> as well as the ability to download videos among other features.
